net.dempsy.transport

Interface Receiver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTcpReceiver, BlockingQueueReceiver, NioReceiver, PassthroughReceiver

    public interface Receiver
extends AutoCloseable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NodeAddress getAddress()
      What address can a Sender use to send messages to this receiver.
      void start(Listener<?> listener, Infrastructure threadingModel)
      A receiver is started with a Listener and a threading model.
      default String transportTypeId()
      What is a unique Id for the transport that this Receiver is associated with.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getAddress

        NodeAddress getAddress()
        What address can a Sender use to send messages to this receiver. This is called PRIOR to start

      • start

        void start(Listener<?> listener,
           Infrastructure threadingModel)
    throws MessageTransportException
        A receiver is started with a Listener and a threading model.
        Throws:
        MessageTransportException

      • transportTypeId

        default String transportTypeId()
        What is a unique Id for the transport that this Receiver is associated with. This information is used by the TransportManager to look up a SenderFactory that's compatible with this Receiver. The default behavior for this method is to provide the package name of the implementing class
